single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch chain - chain skip - skip half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet blo - crocheting in the back loop only increase - increase or make 2 stitches in same spot decrease - decrease or make one stitch over 2 spaces unless otherwise directed magic_ring - magic_ring or magic_ring technique click the image for single_crochet in ea loop around to make the coffee loop deeper in the mug fo handle round1 with blue yarn and 3 5mm hook make a slip knot and single_crochet into the first space made by the single_crochet-blo in row 6 single_crochet in next blo space turn your work around rotate the cup so the bottom is facing up and single_crochet into each of the two back loop spaces made in round 7 total of 4 single_crochet rounds 2-9 without joining continue working in the round single_crochet in ea single_crochet around 4 fasten_off and attach to the loops made by the back loop stitches in rounds 12-13 weave in ends and you are done optional add a keyring and never be without your little coffee cup
